```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

pdf(NULL)

starwars <- starwars
starwars$films <- NULL
starwars$vehicles <- NULL
starwars$starships <- NULL
meltwars <- melt(starwars, id = "name")
meltwars$name <- as.factor(meltwars$name)
```
